name: Noricellum Chapter 1 Demo WIP
description:
Playable Chapter 1 Demo of Sci-fi Game Noricellum. Still missing a lot but it's playable.

Evelyn Chambers, director of Artificial Intelligence aboard the science station Noricellum, has sent you, her brother Liam, a message claiming to have made a breakthrough in her work. After this, however, the station goes silent. You, as Liam, have arrived at the station to investigate what's happened. But Liam may have found more then he bargains for....

Cast:

Tayla Smith -- Evelyn Chambers

Erin B. Lillis -- Automated Greeting System

Cormac Brennan -- Frankie

Alicia Perrone -- Alex

Nicholas Perez -- Liam Chambers

Music:

Kevin MacLeod -- Dark Times 

Kevin MacLeod -- The Dread 

Other Credits:

Ben Harman -- Programming/Writing/Directing/Level Design/UI

Hunter Giannini -- Programming/UI

Michael Hughes -- Programming/ UI

Shawn Ramos -- Level Design

Controls:

Cycle the Middle Mouse Button to Equip Weapons when appropriate.
